title: Kindler

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is roleblock immune, cannot act, or would not have acted to the fullest extent of their abilities, they will become doused. You will be notified they were doused, but not why.
- If there are no Underworld Offensive alive, and the Apocalypse is dead, you will become the Apocalypse.

*May you wander within these fiery mazes for eternity.*
